ygData.subject: Guard Xyrin and the Quest of Something or Another
ygData.msgSnippet: I d like to introduce myself.  My character rather. The name is Tiresias, and right now he s a level 14 Paladin on the Povar server.  You know... Povar... You
ygData.messageBody:
I'd like to introduce myself. My character rather. The name is Tiresias,
and right now he's a level 14 Paladin on the Povar server. You know...
Povar... You never heard of Povar?! =) He serves Erollisi Marr 24/7. I
usually hangs around Freeport area... the commonlands, Desert of Ro, and
Befallen, smiting evil and whatnot. In any case...

I was wondering if anyone did the quest to look for the last Guard Xyrin in
the quest that starts in the Temple of Marr. Is that a beginner's quest or
what? Because I got as far as the isle in the Ocean of Tears talking to all
the Holy Woman O' Fun and I hear a scream come out of nowhere yearning for
help, but I can't find where it's coming from! The nearest islands have
goblins I'm not sure I want to mess with... anybody do this one yet?

-Tiresias
Servant of Erollsi
